cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.EC. 

The paper deals with the problem of combinatorial auction design, which is a topic in game theory and mechanism design (cs.GT). The authors propose a Bayesian framework to incorporate prior information into the auction process, which involves probabilistic modeling and estimation (cs.AI, cs.LG). The paper also discusses the implementation of the auction using assumed density filtering and expectation maximization, which are techniques in data science and machine learning (cs.DS). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed mechanism empirically, which falls under the category of experimental economics (cs.EC).
